column5: This lovely condo is perfect for beachgoers, families, amateur or avid fishermen alike! Located walking distance to the beach, very close to both the Packery Channel Jetties and the legendary Bob Hall Pier. Swimming pool, hot tub and boat slips also available. Comfortably sleeps up to 6 people with 2 fold out beds downstairs and a queen size bed upstairs. We are also one of the few pet-friendly condos in the area; bring the whole family!
